sen.j: 京都証券取引所（きょうとしょうけんとりひきじょ）は、2001年3月1日に廃止された証券取引所である。
sen.e: Kyoto stock exchange was abolished on March 1st, 2001.
The Kyoto stock exchange was abolished on March 1st, 2001.
The Kyoto stock exchange was abolished on March 1st, 2001.

sen.j: 廃止時に上場していた企業については、大阪証券取引所が引き継いだ。
sen.e: Osaka stock exchange took over the companies listed on the Kyoto stock exchange when it was abolished.
The Osaka stock exchange took over companies listed on the Kyoto stock exchange when it was abolished.
The Osaka stock exchange took over companies listed on the Kyoto stock exchange when it was abolished.

sen.j: 京都証券取引所への単独上場企業は、互応化学工業と京都ホテルと三谷伸銅3社だけだった。
sen.e: The companies listed solely on the Kyoto stock exchange were only three: Goo chemical, Kyoto hotel and Mitani Shindo.
Only three companies were listed solely on the Kyoto stock exchange: Goo chemical, Kyoto hotel, and Mitani Shindo.
Only three companies were listed solely on the Kyoto stock exchange: Goo chemical, Kyoto hotel, and Mitani Shindo.

sen.j: 京都府京都市下京区四条通東洞院東入立売西町66番
sen.e: 66 Tachiurinishi-cho, Higashiiru, Higashinotoin, Shijodori, Simogyo-ku, Kyoto city, Kyoto.
66 Tachiurinishi-cho, Higashiiru, Higashinotoin, Shijodori, Simogyo-ku, Kyoto city, Kyoto.
66 Tachiurinishi Town, Higashiiru, Higashinotoin, Shijodori, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
